name: Need for Sleep Help Wanted
description:
This is a demake of Drag Race in the Need for Speed Most Wanted.

Controls :

MoveWASDGear shift
E/QHand Brake
Space

This game is still work in progress. Please let us know if you found any bugs or something else.

Credits:

BGM

- Win by section31 (https://opengameart.org/content/winning-the-race)

SFX

- Car engine loop by domasx2 (https://opengameart.org/content/racing-car-engine-sound-loops)

- Car signal by Yaroslav_Novikov (https://opengameart.org/content/car-signal)

- Car engine start up by looneybits (https://opengameart.org/content/car-engine-start-up-02)
- Car 1 by Yaroslav_Novikov (https://opengameart.org/content/car-1-1)

Models

- Road props low poly by Laxer (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/road-props-low-poly-1233...)

Scripts

- Vehicle Physics Pro by Edy (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/vehicle-physics-pro-communit...)

Created by :

- Finiko - Programmer

- Kukuh - Programmer

- Arrizky - Artist
